## Properties

| Property      | Attribute       | Description                                         | Type      | Default |
| ------------- | --------------- | --------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `onlyOneOpen` | `only-one-open` | if true, only one collapsible can be open at a time | `boolean` | `true`  |

## Slots

| Slot        | Description          |
| ----------- | -------------------- |
| `"default"` | collapsible elements |
